definitions.title: adj. gent.
definitions.body: of foreg.; of individ. 1Ch 11:42 a; c. art. as subst. coll. [[הָרֽאוּבֵנִי]] Nu 26:7, Nu 34:14 (both P), Jos 13:8 (D; +[[הַגׇּדִי]]), 2Ki 10:33 ( +id. +[[הַמְנַשִּׁי]]), 1Ch 12:38 (van d. H. v:1Ch 12:37; +[[הַגׇּדִי]] +[[חֲחִי שֵׁבֶט מְנַשֶּׁה]]), 1Ch 26:32 (id.); [[לָרֽאוּבֵנִי]] 1Ch 5:6, 1Ch 27:16, +[[וְלַגׇּדִי]] (+sts. ´[[חֲחִי שֵׁבֶט מ]]:) De 3:12, De 3:16, De 29:7, Jos 1:12, Jos 12:6, Jos 22:1 (all D), 1Ch 5:26, cf. De 4:43.
